cast.name: 瓦莱莉·迈蕾丝 Valérie Mairesse
蒂埃里·弗雷蒙 Thierry Frémont
弗雷德里克·皮耶罗 Frédéric Pierrot
尼可拉斯·布里代 Nicolas Bridet

writer.name: 维吉妮·维席耶 Virginie Verrier

director.name: 维吉妮·维席耶 Virginie Verrier

introduction: Sidonie, a young air hostess, raises her 15 year old daughter Lolo alone as the father is unknown. In an effort to satisfy Lolo's growing curiosity as to her origins, Sidonie takes her to her own native region, Somme Bay, in search of potential fathers. The aim of the trip : to steal a precious hair from each of these men in order to carry-out a DNA paternity test. There are five potential fathers: a melancholic mechanic, an artist/painter jaded playboy, a former local football champion, a nightclub owner, a womanizing country doctor - five men who open the doors of their lives. Five men, five memories, five confrontations with the past, five unexpected encounters.
